Posts.EditableText:
Hey everyone. I have made a game based off "The Walking Dead" A Telltale series. It currently has 2 episodes out of five. It follows the story of a mentally unstable high school student trying to survive in a zombie filled world, named Dekoda. I would love to hear feedback for the game. 

Episode 1: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/rv-zcimn-uombcfw9fupxw/the-walking-deadkoda-episode-1-a-new-deadkoda

Episode 2: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/euakuwdgsec0cosjsbgclq/the-walking-deadkoda-episode-2-starved-for-deadkoda

I am currently working on Episode 3.
